I'm a Programmer

I love reading alot.. I started my career as a life scientist. After graduating with Biochemistry at the university of Ilorin. I went into teaching. while teaching, I used all my free periods to learn programming. I found joy learning programming.

I am also a football fan. A Kopite and a Barcelona fan.
